segment.source: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO
segment.target: Request the Creation of a New Controlled GPO

segment.source: Unless you are an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you must request the creation of a new Group Policy Object (GPO).
segment.target: Unless you are an Approver or an AGPM Administrator (Full Control), you must request the creation of a new Group Policy Object (GPO).

segment.source: A user account with the Editor or Reviewer role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.
segment.target: A user account with the Editor or Reviewer role or necessary permissions in Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) is required to complete this procedure.

segment.source: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.
segment.target: Review the details in "Additional considerations" in this topic.

segment.source: To create a new GPO with change control managed through AGPM
segment.target: To create a new GPO with change control managed through AGPM

segment.source: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.
segment.target: In the Group Policy Management Console tree, click Change Control in the forest and domain in which you want to manage GPOs.

segment.source: Right-click Change Control, and then click New Controlled GPO.
segment.target: Right-click Change Control, and then click New Controlled GPO.

segment.source: Unless you have special permission to create GPOs, you must submit a request for creation.
segment.target: Unless you have special permission to create GPOs, you must submit a request for creation.

segment.source: In the New Controlled GPO dialog box:
segment.target: In the New Controlled GPO dialog box:

segment.source: To receive a copy of the request, enter your e-mail address in the Cc field.
segment.target: To receive a copy of the request, enter your e-mail address in the Cc field.

segment.source: Type a name for the new GPO.
segment.target: Type a name for the new GPO.

segment.source: Optional: Type a comment for the new GPO.
segment.target: Optional: Type a comment for the new GPO.

segment.source: To deploy the new GPO to the production environment immediately upon approval, click Create live.
segment.target: To deploy the new GPO to the production environment immediately upon approval, click Create live.

segment.source: To create the new GPO offline without immediately deploying it upon approval, click Create offline.
segment.target: To create the new GPO offline without immediately deploying it upon approval, click Create offline.

segment.source: Select the GPO template to use as a starting point for the new GPO.
segment.target: Select the GPO template to use as a starting point for the new GPO.

segment.source: Click Submit.
segment.target: Click Submit.

segment.source: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.
segment.target: When the Progress window indicates that overall progress is complete, click Close.

segment.source: The new GPO is displayed in the list of GPOs on the Pending tab.
segment.target: The new GPO is displayed in the list of GPOs on the Pending tab.

segment.source: When an Approver has approved your request, the GPO will be moved to the Controlled tab.
segment.target: When an Approver has approved your request, the GPO will be moved to the Controlled tab.

segment.source: Additional considerations
segment.target: Additional considerations

segment.source: By default, you must be an Editor or a Reviewer to perform this procedure.
segment.target: By default, you must be an Editor or a Reviewer to perform this procedure.

segment.source: Specifically, you must have List Contents permission for the domain.
segment.target: Specifically, you must have List Contents permission for the domain.

segment.source: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.
segment.target: To withdraw your request before it has been approved, click the Pending tab.

segment.source: Right-click the GPO, then click Withdraw.
segment.target: Right-click the GPO, then click Withdraw.

segment.source: The GPO will be destroyed.
segment.target: The GPO will be destroyed.

segment.source: Additional references
segment.target: Additional references

segment.source: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
segment.target: Creating, Controlling, or Importing a GPO
